basics.name: Seungmin Chou
basics.label: Ph.D Student
basics.summary: A Korean Ph.D student in Data Science at Stony Brook University. I am interested in the field of machine learning.

work.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

education.institution: Chung-Ang University, Seoul, Republic of Korea
courses: Bayesian Statistics, Data Mining, Real Analysis, Topology

scholarship.title: Hyundai Chung-Mong-Koo Scholarship
scholarship.summary: The Hyundai Chung-Mong-Koo Scholarship is awarded to students who have shown exceptional academic performance and leadership potential.
